original_text: Jesus could not do any powerful miracles in his own town. But he did put his hands on a few sick people and he made them well.
korean_text: 거기서는 아무 권능도 행하실 수 없어 다만 소수의 병자에게 안수하여 고치실 뿐이었고

sentences.original_text: Jesus could not do any powerful miracles
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님은 어떤 강력한 기적도 행하실 수 없었습니다

sentences.original_text: But he did put his hands on a few sick people
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그는 몇몇 병자들에게 손을 얹으셨고
